radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Magnetic resonance imaging of the abdomen and limb muscles
radiographic_examinations.findings: Massive hepatomegaly and complete absence of body fat, except bone marrow fat.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Liver volume at presentation was 6905 ml, and liver volume 1 year later was 5178 ml, indicating a 25% reduction.
